snippet.title: Containment Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: Containment is a new game by Finite Reflection Studios coming soon to Steam for Mac and PC! This is a strategic, turn-based simulation game with puzzle elements and a calming soundtrack.

localized.title: Containment Gameplay Trailer
localized.description: Containment is a new game by Finite Reflection Studios coming soon to Steam for Mac and PC! This is a strategic, turn-based simulation game with puzzle elements and a calming soundtrack.
